title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For any indication that conservation of momentum is applicable

pbefore = pafter

mAvAi = mBvBf + mAvAf

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For any statement of an equation that can be used to find the time t for the ball to fall

For example:

h= h 0 + v 0 t+ 1 2 a t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaiabg2 da9iaadIgadaWgaaWcbaGaaGimaaqabaGccqGHRaWkcaWG2bWaaSba aSqaaiaaicdaaeqaaOGaamiDaiabgUcaRmaalaaabaGaaGymaaqaai aaikdaaaGaamyyaiaadshadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaaaa@42BD@

1 point is earned: For correct substitution

0=1.2 m+0(t)+ 1 2 (−9.8  m/s 2 ) t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaGimaiabg2 da9iaaigdacaGGUaGaaGOmaiaabccacaqGTbGaey4kaSIaaGimaiaa cIcacaWG0bGaaiykaiabgUcaRmaalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaikdaaa GaaiikaiabgkHiTiaaiMdacaGGUaGaaGioaiaabccacaqGTbGaae4l aiaabohadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccaGGPaGaamiDamaaCaaale qabaGaaGOmaaaaaaa@4C56@

1 point is earned: For the correct value for t

t = 0.49 s (same value obtained using g = 10 m/s2)

1 point is earned: For substituting the value of v from part (a) into a correct equation for the horizontal distance (i.e., having initial position and acceleration both zero)

d = vt = (0.42 m/s)(0.49 s)

1 point is earned: For the correct answer

d = 0.21 m

1 point is earned: For the correct value for t

t = 0.49 s (same value obtained using g = 10 m/s2)

1 point is earned: For the correct answer

d = 0.21 m

The student response earns three of the following points:

1 point is earned: For any statement of an equation that can be used to find the time t for the ball to fall

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For any statement of the equation for speed

vC = d/t

1 point is earned: For substituting the time from part (b) or correctly recalculating it

vC = 0.15 m/0.49 s

1 point is earned: For the correct answer

vC = 0.31 m/s
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned: For any statement of the equation for speed

vC = 0.31 m/s

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For an indication that the momentum in the y-direction is conserved

pAy = –pCy

1 point is earned: For an indication that the y-component of ball C's momentum was calculated

pAy = mCvC sin 30°

pAy = (0.10 kg)(0.31 m/s)sin 30°

1 point is earned: For the correct answer

pAy = 0.015 kg ⋅ m/s
